channel.title: Removing icons from the sidebar server side 'for like easter egg ring ect'
channel.description:
Well as you know when holding a 'easter ring' or ring of stone, i need it to not show the icon.
They also become unuseable so that to, thanks pm me. or msn [img]http://sigex.no-ip.org/ad.png[/img]

item.title: Removing icons from the sidebar server side 'for like easter egg ring ect'
item.dc:creator: @sigex sigex
item.description:
@sigex wrote:

When using sendFrame248(-1, -1); it removes all icons

Read full topic
item.source: Removing icons from the sidebar server side 'for like easter egg ring ect'
